mapper.select: select SALE_NO , SALE_KIND_CD , DATEDIFF(date(TO_DT), now()) as DDAY , COLUMN_JSON(TITLE_BLOB) AS TITLE_BLOB , WWW_DISP_YN , FROM_DT , TO_DT -- , OPEN_DT from SALE where DEL_YN = 'N' and STAT_CD in ('upcoming', 'open') and WWW_DISP_YN = 'Y' and DATE_FORMAT(TO_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') >= current_date order by TO_DT;
